I like the novel aspect. portal 2 is famous, and for good reason.

Ingredientes Para las tortas fritas:
- 1/2 kg de harina
- 4 cdas de grasa o manteca
- 1/2 taza de agua
- 2 cditas de sal
- Aceite o grasa de vaca para freír, c/n

Preparación:

- De las tortas fritas Poner en un bol la harina cernida y colocar en el centro la grasa a temperatura ambiente.
- Con la punta de los dedos ir tomando la masa, agregando de a poco el agua con la sal y seguir hasta formar un bollo.
- Amasarlo enérgicamente hasta que la masa forme ampollas en su superficie.
- Dejar reposar durante 1 o 2 horas y luego cortar pequeñas pelotitas, achatarlas con la palma de la mano y pincharlas con un tenedor.
- Freírlas enseguida en abundante aceite o grasa muy caliente, retirar con espumadera y colocar sobre papel blanco las torta fritas para que se escurran.
- Espolvorearlas con azúcar molida.
已经是10年前的游戏了，玩起来只能感叹10年前我在哪儿，想起来那时候我还在高一，智能手机还没普及，电脑我也没有，只是一个知道努力学习的学生。今天玩起这个游戏，依然能感受到设计者们的灵感，当能够破解游戏迷局时，可以会心一笑。玩的单人模式首次通关已经游玩了20个小时，多人合作相信更有意思。这样的游戏打折时也不过几块钱，实在是良心！
Игра шикарна, отличный сюжет, интересные тесты, смешные шутки. Игру советую
The valve humor is AMAZING! The voice acting is so good! Appropriately difficult. Must play.

Great story and gameplay, took me about eight hours in total to beat the main storyline. If you are to play this game, you definitely need to beat the first edition to the franchise, Portal; before you play this. Great co-op game mode to play with others.

This is a great game. It's a continuation of Portal, but it's so much better and longer. For the first half of the game, you go through test chambers, but this time, you're not alone. One of the personality cores, Wheatly, tags along, pretending to be your helpful companion, to take down GLaDOS. It works, but Wheatly becomes mad with power and takes over the facility, but not before putting GLaDOS' core into a potato battery. Anyway, for the second half of the game, you go through more test chambers, reunite with GLaDOS, now potatOS, go through even more test chambers, and defeat Wheatly before the facility explodes. There's also a brand new Co-Op mode with its own story, and a puzzle editor where you can create your own puzzles, upload them to the Steam Workshop, and play them with friends. Overall, this game offers many hours of fun, unique and challenging gameplay.

В целом игра не плохая, советую, на часика 2-3 вас точно затянет
